title: From Graz to Glenroy
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia

description: This story explores the journey of migration from Austria to Australia for Elfrida and her husband. As they rebuild life in a new country they deal with triumps and disappointments including the humiliation of never having their qualifications recognised in Australia.
